description:
Kyururu and company arrive at the stage where Japari Park`s idols, PPP, will be holding a concert. PPP`s manager, Margay, says they`re looking for someone to perform as the concert`s opening act and asks the trio to fill the role. But Serval keeps messing up her part, and then an ominous form inches closer to Kyururu. How is this PPP concert going to turn out?
Source: crunchyroll
